Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Specimen Type(s): Clinical isolate of aerobic Gram-negative bacilli
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK 2 AST-Gram Negative Imipenem/Relebactam susceptibility card for automated MIC testing of Gram-negative bacilli on VITEK 2 platforms
Indications for Use Summary: Designed for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-negative bacilli in clinical laboratories using VITEK 2 systems, reporting quantitative Imipenem/Relebactam MIC values for organisms including Acinetobacter calcoaceticus-baumannii complex, Klebsiella aerogenes, Enterobacter cloacae, Escherichia coli, Klebsiella pneumoniae, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Citrobacter freundii, Klebsiella oxytoca, and others.
